markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Celestial Strikes](/Feats.aspx?ID=1363) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your connection to good arms all your attacks against forces of evil. All your weapon and unarmed Strikes deal 1 additional good damage and have the [good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83) and [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) traits.
name: Celestial Strikes
